name: Invoke-Obfuscation RUNDLL LAUNCHER
description: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via RUNDLL LAUNCHER
query: (winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:4697 AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:/.*[Rr][Uu][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ll]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/ AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:/.*[Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]32\.[Dd][Ll][Ll].*/ AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:/.*[Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]_[Rr][Uu][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ll].*/ AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:/.*[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll].*/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:4697 AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*rundll32.exe* AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*shell32.dll* AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*shellexec_rundll* AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*powershell*)`
